concept.title: Page Designer
concept.shortdesc: The Page Designer is a graphical designer within the Designer Studio (DS) Workbench application that helps simplify how you create pages that are displayed in a Triple'A Plus component. By using pages, fragments, and modules in Page Designer, you can create or edit Triple'A Plus component pages. There is no need to worry about the technical prerequisites behind the design. The aim of Page Designer is to have business and IT professionals collaborate effortlessly in defining how a Triple'A Plus component page is presented to the end-user.
